treatment-md.title: Pseudomicrophyllium Cumming, Leong & Lohman, 2017, gen. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Leaf insects from Luzon, Philippines, with descriptions of four new species, the new genus Pseudomicrophyllium, and redescription of Phyllium (Phyllium) geryon Gray, 1843, (Phasmida: Phylliidae)
